page.title: 17Life In Tower Hamlets(2)
page.content:
I think I am very lucky to live in Tower Hamlets in 1985 because this area is not like the City of London it is a residencial area.There are enough parks and open spaces to please everyone.I live in a maisonette just off a main road.Most people in my class live in a block of flats or maisonettes.The buses are not very good because they get held up in the city and come in groups but the tubes are not bad although they get a bit crowded.I have 3 big parks near me,Shandy,Victoria and Mile End.There are courts and pitches at Victoria and Mile End for all different kinds of sports including tennis,football and cricket.They also have swing parks from about 4 to 13 year olds.We have lots of things to entertain us.
Jason Wright(11)
